name: Plan Y - Organic Nightshift Worker Muscle Builder

Meal 1 (Wake-Up Meal).details: Organic High-Protein Breakfast: 3 organic eggs, 1/2 cup organic cottage cheese, 1 slice organic whole grain toast, 1/2 organic avocado, 1 cup organic mixed berries
Meal 1 (Wake-Up Meal).instructions: Scramble eggs. Serve with cottage cheese, toast, sliced avocado, and berries.

Pre-Work Snack.details: Organic Energy-Boosting Smoothie: 1 scoop organic whey protein powder, 1 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 cup organic spinach, 1 cup organic almond milk

Work Meal 1.details: Organic Chicken and Quinoa Bowl: 6 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers), 2 tbsp organic hummus
Work Meal 1.instructions: Grill chicken. Mix quinoa with roasted vegetables. Top with chicken and a dollop of hummus.

Midnight Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt Parfait: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic granola, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 1 tbsp organic honey
Midnight Snack.instructions: Layer yogurt with granola and berries. Drizzle with honey.

Work Meal 2.details: Organic Turkey and Sweet Potato Wrap: 4 oz organic turkey breast, 1/2 organic sweet potato (mashed), 1 organic whole grain wrap, 1 cup organic mixed greens, 1 tbsp organic olive oil mayo
Work Meal 2.instructions: Spread mashed sweet potato on wrap. Add turkey, greens, and mayo. Roll up and serve.

Post-Work Snack.details: Organic Protein Shake: 1.5 scoops organic casein protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds

Before-Sleep Meal.details: Organic Salmon with Quinoa and Asparagus: 4 oz organic baked salmon, 1/2 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic steamed asparagus, 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 organic lemon
Before-Sleep Meal.instructions: Bake salmon. Serve with quinoa and asparagus. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
